title: About

content: Professional Experience üë©‚Äçüíª # Apprenticeship 2023 - present Web development Developing the intranet of the company by developing three modules : Company's Trombinoscope a meeting room manager a company car manager Developed using React and the SharePoint framework, these modules are available within the Microsoft 365 environment. For instance, my modules can be accessed by employees on Teams or SharePoint. Software development internship 2023 - 2023 Ten-week internship in the company 'Blizz' The first four weeks of my internship were dedicated to learning about the different tools and technology that BLIZZ uses. I was able to discover the symfony framework and create a Blog. I was also able to discover the WordPress CMS, and various well-known plugins such as Elementor and WooCommerce. The second part of my internship consisted of carrying out a feasibility study of a ticketing type application with Microsoft Power Platform.
